description: The car that started the supercar revolution. A transverse-mounted 3.9L V12 behind the driver, wrapped in Bertone bodywork so beautiful it belongs in a museum. The SV was the ultimate evolution â€” 385 horsepower and the most refined chassis Lamborghini ever put the Miura name on.
lore: Zero's forgotten stash. Hidden in a hillside tunnel off Route 9. The Miura that started the supercar revolution, abandoned by someone who had too many to remember.
